src_original: na vedhati na pratibhāsati na vighātamāpadyate,
ratnakūṭena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu ratnakūṭa iva saṃdṛśyate /
ratiṃ (KpSū 334) jahena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu ratiṃ jahāti /  dharmolkena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣvasamārakṛtāṃ pratilabhate /
aniketacareṇa samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu niketaṃ nopalabhate /  timirāpagatena samādhinā sarvasamādhicaraṇaṃ na samanupaśyati,
asti ratnamudro nāma samādhiryena sarvasamādhayo mudritā bhavanti /
asti siṃhavikrīḍito nāma samādhiryatra sthitaḥ sarvasamādhibhirvikrīḍati /
sucandro nāma samādhiḥ sarvasamādhīnavabhāsayati /  candradhvajaketuḥ samādhiḥ sarvasamādhīnāṃ dhvajaṃ dhārayati /
vilokitamudro nāma samādhiḥ sarvasamādhīnāṃ murdhānaṃ vyavalokayati /
niyatadhvajaketau samādhau sthitaḥ sarvasamādhīnāṃ dhvajaṃ dhārayati /
